verbose_text: It was shown that the expression of SIRT1 in the pancreas of mice with ANP was significantly decreased to ~ 40% of that in the mice in the control group at 48 and 72 h after the second injection of L-arginine (p < 0.05), but obviously increased SIRT1 expression was detected in the resveratrol treated mice with ANP (p < 0.05) (XREF_FIG).
